page.title: 11Visiting the Police Station
page.content: On 5th June 1985 we visited the { {Ridgeway Police Station}with {Mr {Bustin }the Community Policeman. We were taken through a court to reach the cells. The girls were locked in one cell and the boys in the other. There were peculiar smells in the air. The windows were smashed and there was writing on the walls and the radiator. The beds were very hard and covered with itchy blankets. In the corner was a toilet with a wooden seat. We thought it was unhygenic and disgusting. We visited the court and pretended to be the court members. Our finger prints were taken in the inteview room, and we were allowed to keep them as a souvenir. Johnathan Kneath, nicholas Clarke, John Tranter, Lee Pearce, Nicola Burt, Helen Clausen, Elizabeth Brierley.
